message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. This way, we both get a good share.
You're getting a smaller share, but it's still better than walking away with nothing!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still need a fair share. Let's split it 40/60 this time.
I'm willing to give you a tiny bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal!
I'm getting desperate, but I won't give in completely.  This is my final offer.  If you reject it, we both lose.
You're getting close to begging, Bob. Don't make me have to take everything!
